name: Pillage
description:
The mix of Survival & Parody.
Play alone or with your friends! Your mission is to survive in the middle of the strange forest
How long will you survive? It depends on your skills!


  • That's survival, like in the real world!
  • No zombies!
  • Don't forget to eat, drink and... pee - yes, you can even pee here!
  • Pick up the items that you find on the ground.
  • Fight against other Pillagers and kill them!
  • There are no limits like rounds or specific time & when you log out your equipment is saved!


The stronger you are, the more you can achieve!
